mapper.sql: menuModule, menuPrivilege, sort, menuName, title, url, target, icon
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_menu
menuModule,
menuPrivilege,
sort,
menuName,
title,
url,
target,
icon,
remark,

mapper.update:
update sys_menu
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menuName = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where menuModule = #{menumodule,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and menuPrivilege = #{menuprivilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
